settings.editor:
• Tech Enthusiast, Innovator, Fast Learner. Energetic and passionate B. Tech student pursuing CSE at VIT Chennai.
  • Taking one step at a time learning wherever I go and trying to carve out a niche for myself.
  • This website was made just to give you guys a peek into my life. It contains the skills that I have developed and also the Projects I have made during College. Consider this as my Portfolio!!

I was born in Chennai and brought up in Hyderabad. Hence I'm well versed with multiple languages. I'm 19 at the moment. I watch a lot of Cricket and guess what, becoming a Cricketer was my childhood dream!! Though that didn't really materialize :) , I quickly found my latest passion that is Computer Science. Hence after my 12th, I took up Computer Science and Engineering at VIT Chennai.

Currently I've completed my Sophomore year. In the past 2 years, I've a lot of things and made tons of memories. Sadly all the fun was interrupted by COVID :( . But on the brighter side, I did develop a lot of skills ranging from People skills to Programming to Web Development. Here's to a brighter and better future. Live, Let live!!

Used Machine learning for the training of emotion detection. Python is used for the front-end. Have explored various deep learning libraries like Keras tensor flow along with Numphy. The main objective of this project can best describe as a stress relief project

Created an accessible registration website for the hostlers to register complaints, to check the status of the complaints registered, warden to process the complaint , assign the respective worker to resolve the complaint. It has a tracker system that can track your complaint.

This site helps small scale sellers compete with all the big brands. It suggest the customer the products based on their past searches, preferences, searches etc. Tech stack used : React JS , HTML: For basic design parts , CSS , JavaScript : For login Page, Json, Firebase: For real-time database with live rendering, Stripe: For the Payment Gateway Context API

settings.title: Analysis and Visualization of Delhi Metro System

settings.editor:
This project analyzes the interaction of the Delhi traffic through the interaction between the Delhi Metro.
• We can find out the nodes with highest interactions and reduce/decongest it so that it can benefit all other nodes.
• Traffic reduction benefits all other aspects connected with it such as environmental pollution, time effectiveness, fuel wastage.
• Tools used: Network data set is extracted from GTFS information such as ArcGIS or QGIS.
